entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
